cert-009.title: Git Essentials:
cert-009.subtitle: Learn Git with Bitbucket and Sourcetree
cert-009.description: Learn and build projects with pure JavaScript. Start with the basic fundamentals and work to advanced programming WITHOUT relying on frameworks or libraries at all.

list.item-1: Integrate Git in their daily projects.
list.item-2: Execute basic commands in the command line.
list.item-3: Be comfortable using Git commands on the companies project(s).

cert-008.title: Modern JavaScript
cert-008.subtitle: From the beginning
cert-008.description: Learn and build projects with pure JavaScript. Start with the basic fundamentals and work to advanced programming WITHOUT relying on frameworks or libraries at all.

list.item-1: Basics & Fundamentals: Data types, let & const variables, functions, conditionals, loops, object literals, arrays, etc
list.item-2: DOM Manipulation: Selectors, traversing the DOM, show/hide, creating & removing elements, event listeners
list.item-3: OOP: ES5 prototypes, inheritance, ES2015 classes & sub-classes, constructors<
list.item-4: Async JS: Ajax & XHR, Fetch API, callbacks, promises, async / await
list.item-5: ES2015+: Arrow functions, template strings, generators, iterators, maps & sets, symbols & more

cert-007.title: 50 Projects In 50 Days
cert-007.subtitle: - HTML, CSS & JavaScript
cert-007.description: This is a purely project-based course. It is geared toward beginners, but intermediate developers can also enjoy creating new things. This course includes 50 mini projects in HTML, CSS & JavaScript that relate to the DOM (Document Object Model.

list.item-1: project based teaching to sharpen HTML, CSS & JavaScript skills
list.item-2: build unique projects in a short timeframe
list.item-3: modern styling with flexbox, CSS animations, custom properties, etc
list.item-4: DOM manipulation, events, array methods, HTTP requests & more

cert-006.title: Adobe XD
cert-006.subtitle: UI/UX Design, prototype, and handoff from scratch
cert-006.description: Adobe XD is a powerful tool for UI/UX designers giving the power to design and prototype an entire app, all from one program. This course starts off with Adobe XD basics and quickly gets up to speed on designing and prototyping a full fledged app with amazing images, colors, and animations.

list.item-1: navigate around the interface and toggle on/off the panels
list.item-3: convert icons and buttons into symbols to reuse across your entire project
list.item-4: prototyple, test, share projects, prototypes, and design assets

cert-005.title: Angular CLI
cert-005.subtitle: - Mastering the Basics
cert-005.description: This course contains all the fundamentals, simplified and straight forward.

list.item-1: Generate Angular applications and the different features in Angular such as components, services etc using the CLI
list.item-2: Build and Serve Angular applications using the CLI
list.item-3: Add external libraries to Angular CLI applications

cert-004.title: Jira for Beginners
cert-004.subtitle: - Detailed Course to Get Started in Jira
cert-004.description: Learn how to manage projects with Jira for agile teams.

list.item-3: Create and customize a Team-Managed Project, Company-Managed Project
list.item-4: Create and manage Scrum Boards and Kanban Boards
list.item-5: Create Issues, Filters, Custom Fields, Dashboards

cert-003.title: Security Awareness
cert-003.subtitle: Valtech Training
cert-003.description: Security awareness training is a type of cyber security education that gives an organization’s end users the knowledge they need to protect confidential information from cyber criminals.

list.item-1: Importance of Security & What needs protection

cert-001.description: Developer Certification, representing approximately 300 hours of coursework. Learn the languages that developers use to build webpages using modern techniques, accessibility, ect. Duration: 300 hours
